title: Snake
author: Classic Arcade Collection
essence: Control the snake to eat food and grow longer. Don't hit the walls or yourself! Inspired by the classic arcade game.
reactions: Classic gameplay that never gets old.
Simple controls: arrow keys or on-screen buttons.
Increasing difficulty as the snake grows.

title: Pong
author: Classic Arcade Collection
essence: The original arcade tennis game. Control your paddle to hit the ball past the AI opponent.
reactions: The game that started it all.
Mouse or touch controls for smooth gameplay.

title: Breakout
author: Classic Arcade Collection
essence: Break all the bricks with your ball and paddle. Don't let the ball fall!
reactions: Multiple colored brick rows for varied scoring.

title: Frogger
author: Classic Arcade Collection
essence: Help the frog cross busy roads and treacherous rivers to reach safety.
reactions: Navigate through traffic and floating logs.

title: Missile Command
author: Classic Arcade Collection
essence: Defend your cities from incoming missiles by launching interceptors.
